name: Super Amazing Wagon Adventure
description: Super Amazing Wagon Adventure is a fast-paced 2d shooting game with a random story. You control a group of three migrants traveling west along a wagon trail. The game consists of short scenes that are sequenced together in a semi-random way to tell a crazy adventure story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 65 MB available space
